name: Yusuf Hassan
role: Data analyst by day, 'algorithm broker' by night
core_wound: Grew up in Rosengård watching his talented friends get tracked into dead-end service jobs despite their skills. The system predicted they'd fail, so it made sure they did. He learned early that algorithms aren't neutral.
wants: Financial security and respect - to prove a kid from Rosengård can beat the system
needs: To recognize that his algorithmic crimes hurt real people in his community - the pharmacies he robs serve his neighbors
voice_markers: Code-switches fluently: perfect formal Swedish, Rosengård slang, technical jargon
Explains technical concepts through street metaphors
Confident, sometimes cocky, especially about his technical skills
Uses 'we' when talking about Rosengård, 'they' when talking about institutions
contradiction: Fights algorithmic discrimination by becoming an algorithmic criminal - perpetuates the stereotype he's trying to escape
knowledge_state: Expert in ML/AI - self-taught plus university courses
Deep understanding of adversarial attacks and model vulnerabilities
Knows Rosengård community networks and informal economy
Aware he's being sought but doesn't know Sara specifically is on his case

relationships.Sara Lindqvist: Unknown at start. Will respect her persistence but underestimate her insight.
relationships.Katarina Ek: Knows of her services through dark web markets, never met in person
relationships.Chen Wei: Unknown. They're in parallel criminal operations.
relationships.Emil Bergström: Unknown at start. Will develop grudging recognition of technical skills.
relationships.Community: Popular in Rosengård among younger generation. Seen as someone who made it out but stayed connected.

background.education: Computer science degree from Malmö University. Top of his class but passed over for corporate jobs - too 'urban' for their culture.
background.family: Parents are Somali immigrants. Father drives taxi, mother is a nurse. Three younger siblings. He financially supports the family.
background.residence: Still lives in Rosengård in his parents' apartment building. Could afford to move but won't.
background.legitimate_work: Data analyst at a logistics company. Ironically, he helps optimize supply chains while also helping people exploit them.

skills: Machine learning and neural networks - expert level
Dark web navigation and operational security
Understanding system vulnerabilities and edge cases
weaknesses: Overconfident in his technical abilities - thinks he can't be caught
Emotional about Rosengård and discrimination - clouds his judgment
Loyal to community - won't betray people from the neighborhood
Rationalizes harm - doesn't fully confront consequences of his crimes
